user.title: Enphase EV Charger 2 (Cloud)
user.description: Sign in with your Enlighten credentials.

data_description.password: Password is only stored if you enable the checkbox.
data_description.remember_password: Allows the integration to refresh tokens automatically when they expire.

mfa.title: Verify MFA Code
mfa.description: Enter the one-time code sent to your email. Codes are valid for 5 minutes. You can request a new code every 30 seconds.

data_description.otp: Use the code from the Enphase login prompt.
data_description.resend_code: Request a new code if the previous one expired.

site.title: Select Site
site.description: Pick which Enlighten site to link.

devices.title: Select Chargers
devices.description: Choose one or more chargers to add. All selections share the same polling interval.

data_description.serials: Select chargers from your site or paste serial numbers if none are listed.
data_description.scan_interval: Seconds between cloud status polls. Default 60s.
data_description.site_only: Skip charger setup when your site has none. Only the site device will be created.

error.service_unavailable: Enphase temporarily unavailable. Try again later.
error.otp_invalid: Invalid or expired code. Try again.
error.otp_blocked: Too many attempts. The account is temporarily blocked.
error.resend_wait: Please wait 30 seconds before requesting a new code.
error.serials_required: Select or enter at least one charger.
error.serials_or_site_only_required: Enter at least one charger or enable site-only mode.

abort.manual_mode_removed: Legacy manual authentication entries are no longer supported. Remove the integration and set it up again using Enlighten login.
abort.wrong_account: This entry is already linked to {configured_label}. Remove the integration from Home Assistant and add a new one to link {requested_label}.

charger_not_plugged.message: Cannot start charging because {name} is unplugged from the vehicle.

data.fast_while_streaming: Prefer fast polling while cloud stream active

data_description.scan_interval: Seconds between cloud status polls. Default 60s.
data_description.fast_poll_interval: Interval to use while charging or streaming.
data_description.fast_while_streaming: When enabled, fast poll during active cloud streaming.
data_description.session_history_interval: Minutes to wait between cloud session history fetches.
data_description.site_only: Skip charger polling and only keep the site device active.
data_description.reauth: Launch the login flow to refresh credentials without removing the integration.
data_description.forget_password: Removes the stored password. Automatic refresh will no longer be attempted.
